name: Gun Breaker - Best Idle Game
description:
Download the most realistic and interactive gun idle game ever created! Fire the most famous, most recognized weapons in the world, as well as guns from the future that have never been seen.

Customize your weapon lineup by unlocking more guns and exploding more targets as fast as you can.

Gun Breaker is the ultimate gun simulation that combines gun action, realistic physics explosions, bullet effects, slow-motion and target smashing.

FEATURES
• Collect guns to build and upgrade your arsenal with a continually growing selection of firearms, including lasers, plasma blasters and cannons.
• Load up and fire your guns at endless clips of destructible block targets.
• Become the ultimate gunsmith, creating the perfect weapon lineup.
• Upgrade the damage of your gun arsenal through the bullet damage upgrade system.
• Win fame by competing in the unofficial contest of who can break the most blocks per second in the world.
• Easily share screenshots of your gun breaking arsenal through text or social media.
• High-quality graphics and smooth framerate.
• Ultra-realistic particle physics destruction simulation.
• Auto-rotate through your guns or select your favourite gun and use it to blast through endless destructible block targets.

The game has an ever growing collection of guns and weapons which includes, rifles, pistols, shotguns, handguns, machine guns, miniguns, lasers, plasma blasters, cannons, rocket launchers and more weapons from the future.

Gun Breaker also works as a great reference app to your favorite 3rd party fps video games including COD, Fortnite, Battlefield, Battlefront, and PubG!

Gun Breaker Complete Gun Set:
• With Gun Breaker Complete Gun Set, you gain access to the complete gun arsenal found in Gun Breaker.
• You will receive all available guns, gun upgrades and enough coins to purchase every future upgrade.
• You will also receive additional coins to purchase any future game features which may include new damage upgrades, new guns, new bullet effects and everything else to come.
